FuncDef: This command lists all subscribers on the system that had referenced an accumulated statistics policy. The list contains subscribers that are currently referencing anaccu-stats-policyas well as subscribers that no longer reference anaccu-stats-policy(due to removal of the policy from the subscriber profile).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a specific subscriber ID, up to 32 characters.
Lists all subscribers that are referencing the specified subscriber profile, up to 32 characters.
